snippet.title: Zombie Legion - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
[WARNING: Either out of laziness or clear-as-day low-budget nature of many Nostra Games titles, the game uses AI generated images for the title screen, trophy icons, PlayStation Store banner, icon and menu image. The game itself, however, doesn't use any AI generated content, thankfully.]

Command and control your own horde of zombies to defeat your opponents and become the greatest in the arenas. Collect weak humans and turn them into your weapons. The larger your undead army, the greater your chances of domination.

Developed by NOSTRA GAMES
Also released on PlayStation 5

#ps4 #playstation4 #theforeseenarcade #zombielegion #zombiegames #zombie #zombiegame #nostragames
